section.p: The SDK returns the result of this method call in the "onStreamPublished" callback. The SDK will trigger a callback locally to report the status of adding the bypass push address.

plentry.pt: The host in a channel can call the addPublishStreamUrl method to add a media stream to the CDN.

ul.li: : Transcoding (Transcoding refers to transcoding the audio and video streams during bypass push, and then pushing them to other CDN servers. It is mostly suitable for scenes where there are multiple anchors in the channel and need to be mixed and video mixing). If it is set to, the method needs to be called first.
